error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to server. Please check the address and try again. If a port was provided, it must be within a valid range. Also ensure that you are running at least version 1.7 of Minecraft Java Edition on your server.
error.invalid_ip: IP address is invalid (MAC address could not be determined). Please correct it and try again.
error.invalid_port: Port must be in range from 1024 to 65535. Please correct it and try again.

user.description: Set up your Minecraft Server instance to allow monitoring.
user.title: Link your Minecraft Server
